originalText.text: Hannan, John, Nicole and The Harrison Grandelli Team helped me find my first home to purchase in Brooklyn, New York. Hannah has been extremely hands on and attentive, really listening to the things that I want and gave really honest feedback about the places we've visited. John is also extremely knowledgeable and gave very insightful advice and tips about things to look out for, which gave me the confidence that I'm making the right decision. The team is very on top of things and worked very hard in the background, even making several strategic suggestions to guarantee that the deal closes smoothly within my timeline. It's the team's attention to detail and care for their client (we still keep in touch even months after closing!) that really sells it and I would recommend working with them to anyone.

originalText.text: Hannan, John, and Nicole were a pleasure to work with as they helped walk me through the process of purchasing my first home in Brooklyn, NY. I'd recommend the Harrison Grandelli Team to anyone looking for a home in the New York City area.

text.text: Hannan, John, and Nicole were a pleasure to work with as they helped walk me through the process of purchasing my first home in Brooklyn, NY. I'd recommend the Harrison Grandelli Team to anyone looking for a home in the New York City area.

originalText.text: My daughter was moving to Manhattan for her first job and Mike Taddonio was absolutely wonderful! He went above and beyond to help us find a place from out of state. He went to apartments and sent us videos of not only the apartment but the building common places and street. He educated us on the real estate process and the neighborhoods, since it has been years since I lived there. I highly recommend Mike and will definitely use him in the future

originalText.text: As someone who was unfamiliar with the NYC real estate market, I found the process of finding an apartment very complex and daunting.  Nicole Grandelli and her team at Core Group made everything so much easier and they even got some of the move in fees waved.  I honestly think I would have given up mid process if it were not for Nicole.  Nicole and her team were prompt,  honest, transparent and good at communicating throughout the process.  Now that we have the apartment, they have been great at answering questions and making sure we have our utilities turned on.  I would not hesitate to recommend the Harrison Grandelli Team at Core and will use them again for any future NYC real estate transactions.  Thank you!

originalText.text: Nicole and her team were INCREDIBLE partners to work with. I worked closely with Nicole and Evan for several months and always felt like I could reach out at any point and would get an answer so quickly. I can't imagine my NYC home buying process without their dedicated support - they are truly spectacular!
